distinct
from SVC_MNG.TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update SVC_MNG.TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST
ORDER_CARD_LIST_ID = #{record.orderCardListId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_ID = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARDHOLDER_ID = #{record.cardholderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_NAME = #{record.lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRST_NAME = #{record.firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTERNAL_ID = #{record.externalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_NO = #{record.cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_PIN_STATE = #{record.cardPinState,jdbcType=CHAR},
CARD_STATE = #{record.cardState,jdbcType=CHAR},
LEG_CARD_NO = #{record.legCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_AMOUNT = #{record.creditAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
MODIFY_USER = #{record.modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
DATA_STATE = #{record.dataState,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORDER_LIST_ID = #{record.orderListId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update SVC_MNG.TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST set ORDER_CARD_LIST_ID = #{record.orderCardListId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARDHOLDER_ID = #{record.cardholderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_NAME = #{record.lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_NAME = #{record.firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTERNAL_ID = #{record.externalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_NO = #{record.cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_PIN_STATE = #{record.cardPinState,jdbcType=CHAR}, CARD_STATE = #{record.cardState,jdbcType=CHAR}, LEG_CARD_NO = #{record.legCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDIT_AMOUNT = #{record.creditAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, MODIFY_USER = #{record.modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, DATA_STATE = #{record.dataState,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORDER_LIST_ID = #{record.orderListId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.card_no as "cardNo", t2.face_value as "faceValue", t2.service_id as "serviceId", t2.validity_period as "validityPeriod" from tb_sell_order_card_list t, tb_sell_order t2 where t.order_id = t2.order_id and t.data_state='1' and t.order_id =#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
